name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols,and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise withthe power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always beenshrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.
